description: Long-form publishing platform for thought leadership, SEO-optimized articles, and professional writing with built-in audience and publication network

long_form_editor.description: Clean, distraction-free writing interface with formatting options
long_form_editor.use_case: Article writing with images, code blocks, quotes

publications.description: Submit articles to curated publications for wider distribution

seo_optimization.description: Google-indexed articles with customizable meta descriptions

stats_analytics.description: Track views, read ratio, fans, referring sources

membership_program.description: Monetize articles through member reading time

integration_details.TOOL-SMM-007: LinkedIn - Share article links for professional audience
integration_details.TOOL-SMM-006: Twitter - Share excerpts and article links
integration_details.TOOL-PUB-002: Substack - Cross-promote Medium content in newsletter

object_details.OBJ-PUB-001: Medium Article - 2,000+ word SEO-optimized cornerstone guide

content_strategy.posting_frequency: 1-2 articles per week for consistent presence
content_strategy.optimal_times: Weekday mornings (8-10am EST) for professional audience

structure: Value: Comprehensive guide with actionable insights
formatting: Bullet points and lists for scannability
seo_optimization: Internal links to your other articles

technical_specifications.supported_media: Images, embedded videos, tweets, code blocks

pricing.model: Free to publish for all users
pricing.partner_program: Free to join - Earn based on member reading time

platform_specs.demographics: Professional, educated audience seeking in-depth content
platform_specs.geographic_strength: Global, particularly strong in USA, India, Europe

strengths: Excellent SEO - Google indexes all articles
No need to build audience from scratch
limitations: You don't own the audience (Medium does)
No custom domain for personal profiles
Competition with thousands of daily articles

content_creation: Use Hook → Context → Value → CTA structure
publication_strategy: Submit to 2-3 relevant publications per article
Wait 24-48 hours between publication and cross-post
Engage with comments on your articles
seo_optimization: Optimize first paragraph for Google preview
audience_building: Build email list via embedded forms
Create article series to retain readers

algorithm_optimization.read_ratio: PRIMARY metric - percentage who read to end
algorithm_optimization.claps: Reader appreciation metric (up to 50 per reader)
algorithm_optimization.fans: Followers who get notified of new articles

typical_workflows: Research keyword → Outline 2,000+ word article → Write with Hook-Context-Value-CTA → Add images every 300 words → Optimize SEO → Publish → Submit to publications → Share on LinkedIn/Twitter → Monitor performance → Iterate based on data

performance_metrics.read_ratio: Percentage of viewers who read to end (quality metric)

alternatives: Personal blog (full control, requires audience building)
